H0.text: What type of dog is traditionally used above the Arctic Circle to pull sleds over snow. Samoyed

H1.text: What type of dog is traditionally used above the Arctic Circle to pull sleds over snow. Alaskan Malamute

H2.text: What type of dog is traditionally used above the Arctic Circle to pull sleds over snow. Canadian Eskimo Dog

H3.text: What type of dog is traditionally used above the Arctic Circle to pull sleds over snow. Husky

A4.text: Chukotka sled dog teams have been used since prehistoric times to pulls sleds in harsh conditions

A5.text: Siberian Huskies originated in Northeast Asia where they are bred by the Chukchi people ... for sled pulling and companionship
